subj-group.subject: Selected Papers from the Annual Meetings Program for 1976

title-group.article-title: Industry Concentration, Financial Structure and Profitability

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1977 Board of Regents of the University of Wisconsin System

abstract.p: This study examines operating and financing characteristics of 495 firms grouped into 9 industry concentration classes. Analysis of equity returns indicate that, once above a "threshold" concentration level, significantly higher returns exist which previously have been capitalized in stock values.
